main event: A Coast Guard surface craft, the USCS ESCANABA, reported seeing a very bright light pass over the ship on July 27, 1964 at 0330A.
interesting points: The light was described as round, brilliant white, 2-3 seconds in duration, and traveling at high speed approximately 200 feet in altitude.
No sound was heard during the sighting.
The sighting occurred at the position 33-00N 176-30W in the Pacific Ocean.
witnesses: Coast Guard surface craft USCS ESCANABA
